arStrings.szText:
While you have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} or more Minions you gain:
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to empower all of your Minions, causing the next attack from each to explode for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.
